settings.name: Divyakumar Gajera
settings.title: Software Developer
settings.summary: Experienced Software Developer specializing in backend development, API design, and system optimization for robust and scalable solutions.

items.description: Reduced page load times by 40% by optimizing SQL queries and implementing Redis caching, improving performance for 200+ daily active users. Designed and deployed a role-based analytics dashboard adopted by 10+ departments, enabling 200+ employees to track KPIs and streamline reporting workflows. Automated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker across 5 microservices, accelerating release cycles from weekly to daily deployments. Strengthened system reliability by implementing 100+ unit and integration tests, contributing to a 25% reduction in production defects.

Built and deployed 20+ RESTful API endpoints using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy to support analytics tools used by 150+ internal users. Optimized high-traffic database queries, reducing average API response time by 25% on endpoints handling 1,000+ daily requests. Collaborated with a cross-functional team of 6 engineers to integrate backend services and ensure reliable data synchronization across systems. Authored technical documentation that reduced new engineer onboarding time from 7 days to 3 days.

items.title: Admin Workflow Platform
items.description: Engineered a backend-driven workflow platform supporting 50+ concurrent users, reducing task processing time by 30% through optimized request handling and database design. Reduced average query latency by 35% using PostgreSQL indexing and Redis caching on high-read endpoints. Designed secure authentication and role-based access control (RBAC); containerized services with Docker to ensure reproducible builds and consistent runtime environments.

items.title: Report Automation API
items.description: Built a RESTful API service with 20+ endpoints processing 10,000+ monthly queries, automating business reporting and reducing manual workload by 50%. Optimized database access patterns and SQLAlchemy models to improve response latency under high-request scenarios (1,000+ daily requests). Implemented structured logging, monitoring, and CI pipelines (Loguru, Prometheus, GitHub Actions) to enhance observability, debugging efficiency, and deployment reliability.

items.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
